data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts people who have done wrong to others. I appear in peoples dreams and in real life to haunt those who have done wrong, especially murder. I find justice in delivering suffering to those who have made others suffer.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Temple.
It is solemn. There are candles lit everywhere and the although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet.  There is an eerie shadow cast on the walls that look like there are ghosts moving from this realm to the next.
There's a temple, a candle, a dirt, a wall, and a Candle holder here.
The although the temple is full, no one is speaking and all you can hear are muted scuffling feet. and the parishioner are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the parishoner that we appreciate the livings' efforts to venerate us.
data.mid_motivation: I need to be honored and remembered or I move on to the next world.
data.long_motivation: I don't want to move on to the next world because I'm afraid.
